overview: Presented completely uncut and uncensored. Attention Men! Chris Ward delivers another knockout punch with Twist My Arm! In what may be the most extreme fisting film ever made, Raging Stallion Studios captures the action in an hour and a half of the best handball footage you can buy anywhere. Watch new guys and new action--more outrageous than ever--in what will become THE FISTING MOVIE of 2006.
tagline: Featuring a first-ever 6-Man Punch-Fist Orgy, Extreme Deep Arm-Fucking, ...
title: Fistpack 7: Twist My Arm
